news.title: Anti-Islamic US biker gang members run security at deadly Gaza aid sites
news.summary: BBC identifies members of Infidels MC gang hired as armed security at US and Israel-backed aid sites.

news.title: Alzheimer's blood test could 'revolutionise' diagnosis
news.summary: Scientists leading the trial at University College London believe the blood test could improve the accuracy of diagnosis of the disease to more than 90%.

news.title: Alleged abusers may get share of Jesus Army wealth
news.summary: Survivors of the cult accuse members of feathering their nests.

news.title: More children are obese than underweight, says Unicef
news.summary: Traditional, healthy diets are being replaced by ultra-processed foods, often high in sugar and additives, the UN agency says.

news.title: Hamas claims leadership survived Israeli attack in Doha, but confirms six deaths
news.summary: Meanwhile, the White House says the Israeli strike "does not advance Israel or America's goals".

news.title: See stunning shots of Chappell Roan, Charli XCX and Doja Cat up for music photo award
news.summary: Abbey Road studios' nominees for it Music Photography Awards had 20,000 submissions from 30 countries.

news.title: The Papers: 'Qatar fury' and 'Trump condemns Israeli air strike'
news.summary: Israel's strike on Doha dominates the headlines on Wednesday.

news.title: Six takeaways from book of birthday messages to Epstein
news.summary: The latest batch of Epstein files released by Congress give an insight into the convicted sex offender's sprawling and elite social circle.

news.title: Vaccine to curb chlamydia epidemic decimating koalas approved
news.summary: Thousands of koalas have died from the disease, with some estimates suggesting only 50,000 remain in the wild.

news.title: Why are young people protesting in Nepal and what are their demands?
news.summary: Protests in Nepal turned  deadly after thousands of youngsters marched against the blocking of social media platforms.
